units.title: Mount sections on 96-well coverslip
units.text: sections were placed on a 96-well format coverslip that was subsequently attached to a 96-well superstructure allowing immunohistological treatment, followed by imaging and antibody elution.
units.rationale: Describes the physical setup for multiplexed immunohistochemistry.

units.title: Multiplexed immunohistochemistry on FFPE sections
units.text: We performed multiplexed immunohistochemistry on 3-μm-thick formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) sections (1–4 sections per sample; Supplementary Table 1 and Fig. 1b).
units.rationale: Specifies the sample preparation and staining approach.

units.title: Acquire tiled high‑magnification images
units.text: We generated tiled images at ×40 magnification with a high-numerical-aperture (NA) silicone oil objective to cover length scales from the millimeter to the nanometer scale (pixel size, 0.1625 μm).
units.rationale: Details the imaging parameters for capturing multiscale data.

units.title: Execute 21 immunohistochemical cycles
units.text: We performed 21 immunohistochemical cycles (39 weeks) ... Elute antibodies - Register - Pixel cluster.
units.rationale: Outlines the iterative staining, elution, and registration workflow.

units.title: Apply 4i across developmental timecourse
units.text: To establish a spatial retinal organoid reference map, we applied 4i covering a timecourse of human retinal organoid development (6, 12, 18, 24 and 39 weeks; 2–4 organoids per timepoint; Supplementary Table 1).
units.rationale: Defines the temporal scope of the multiplexed imaging experiment.

units.title: Create antibody panel
units.text: We established a panel of 63 antibodies covering major retinal cell types, subcellular compartments, morphological structures and cell signaling pathways split into three color channels.
units.rationale: Lists the reagents used to label distinct cellular components.

units.title: Perform variance analysis and UMAP visualization
units.text: variance analysis in the protein expression feature space and visualization in a uniform manifold approximation and projection (UMAP) embedding revealed eight molecularly distinct nuclei clusters.
units.rationale: Describes the computational step for dimensionality reduction and clustering.

units.title: Segment nuclei and organelle structures
units.rationale: Specifies the image‑analysis operation to isolate cellular compartments.

units.title: Transfer labels from scRNA‑seq to protein clusters
units.text: colored by labels transferred from sequenced cells.
units.rationale: Links protein‑based clusters to transcriptomic cell identities.

units.title: Hierarchical clustering and heat‑map of protein expression
units.text: Hierarchical clustering and heat map visualization of average protein expression within each MTU highlight how each protein stain associates.
units.rationale: Summarizes the method for summarizing protein patterns across spatial units.
